name: INSetAudioSourceInCarIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for changing a vehicleâ€™s audio source.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: func resolveAudioSource(for: INSetAudioSourceInCarIntent, with: (INCarAudioSourceResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves an explicitly selected audio source.

items.name: func resolveRelativeAudioSourceReference(for: INSetAudioSourceInCarIntent, with: (INRelativeReferenceResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the audio source using a relative qualifier.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSetAudioSourceInCarIntent, completion: (INSetAudioSourceInCarIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can change the audio source.
